1    | /*---------------------------------------
2    |   WN_OS.C
3    | ---------------------------------------*/
4    | 
5    | #include "video/v_video.h"
6    | #include "window.h"
7    | 
8    | extern SCREEN _cursvar;
9    | 
10   | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
11   |    FUNCTION: OS_shell()
12   |     PURPOSE: Call operating system shell.
13   |      SYNTAX: void OS_shell(void);
14   |  DESRIPTION: Creates new window for the shell and creates a new
15   |              shell, which can be left by 'exit'
16   |     RETURNS: Nothing
17   |     VERSION: 901107 V0.2
18   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
19   | void OS_shell()
20   | {
21   |   WINDOW *OS_window;
22   | 
23   |   OS_window = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,_cursvar.lines,
24   |                       16*BLACK+WHITE,16*BLACK+WHITE);
25   |   wn_clear(OS_window);
26   |   v_cursoron();
27   |   printf("Return to simulation program with 'exit' ...\n\n");
28   |   system(getenv("COMSPEC"));
29   |   OS_window = wn_close(OS_window);
30   | }
